scripts.deploy:dev: sam deploy --profile rnd --no-confirm-changeset --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --stack-name hello-world-with-stages  --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region ap-south-1 --parameter-overrides "ParameterKey=Stage,ParameterValue=dev" --s3-bucket hello-world-api-with-stages
